display_long_description:
Welcome to Solar System, an immersive educational experience designed for Meta Quest!

🌍 Explore the Solar System Like Never Before

Dive into the vastness of space and experience the solar system in breathtaking detail. Solar System allows you to travel among the planets, witness the moons in orbit, and observe the cosmic movements of celestial bodies like the Sun, Earth, and Moon—all in real-time VR.

✨ Key Features

	•	Accurate 3D models of the entire solar system
	•	Orbit Simulator: Watch planets and moons move in real-time, demonstrating the natural motions of the solar system
	•	Time Acceleration to reveal the dynamic motion of planetary bodies across the solar system
	•	Educational insights on the Sun, planets, moons, and the entire solar system

🎓 Engaging for Learners 10 and Up
Perfect for students, educators, and space enthusiasts aged 10 and above. Whether you’re curious about space, studying astronomy, or fascinated by the Earth, Sun, and planets, this app provides an interactive, immersive way to explore the solar system.

👨‍🏫 Great for Educational Settings
Teachers can use Solar System to transform lessons into virtual journeys across the solar system, exploring planets like Earth, Mars, and more—sparking curiosity and inspiring future astronomers.

🔭 Coming Soon

	•	Detailed info panels for each planet in the solar system
	•	Quizzes and space challenges to deepen your knowledge of the solar system
	•	Guided solar system tours for an immersive learning experience
